conbody.p: The Design Studio (DS) Workbench application is an integrated graphical environment that enables business and IT professionals to define and create business process flows without the need for advanced programming abilities. The application provides "designers" that utilizes modelling and text-based tools to provide a graphical view of the business process under development, and automatically generates the underlying programming codes. Changes or additional requirements can be easily adapted without requiring major effort. DS Workbench automatically manages the information flow from one designer to another.

The DS Workbench designers are:
Domain Designer
Page Designer
Menu Designer
Pageflow Designer
Workflow Designer
Rule Designer
Translation Editor
